A weird hospital call
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): A weird hospital call
By Canute on Tuesday, June 1, 2004 - 05:38 pm:

i was informed about an illness on my joker, i go to the hospital to find out it has a sprained ankle (or whatever it was)i find that kinda funny. was that supposed to happen?

By Infernus on Tuesday, June 1, 2004 - 05:58 pm:

It does happen at points, but it's best to try and avoid it. Your monster either got injured in battle, or on an expedition, or you've been working it to hard. It may also be quite possible that it just had an accident. Hehehe, well, probably not that last one.

The oddest part about that is...well, Jokers don't have ankles...meh.

By King952 on Wednesday, June 2, 2004 - 05:18 pm:

Joker's have ankles?
